policies.title: Academic Integrity Policy
policies.content: Students must maintain academic honesty in all assessments. Plagiarism and cheating will result in severe penalties.

policies.title: Late Submission Policy
policies.content: Late submissions will incur a 10% penalty per day unless prior approval is obtained.

policies.title: Special Consideration
policies.content: Students facing extenuating circumstances may apply for special consideration with supporting documentation.

policies.title: Attendance Policy
policies.content: Students must maintain 80% attendance in all courses. Failure to do so may result in academic penalties.

faqs.question: How do I access course materials?
faqs.answer: Log in to Moodle with your KOI credentials and navigate to your enrolled courses.

faqs.question: How do I apply for special consideration?
faqs.answer: Submit the special consideration form with supporting documents at least 3 days before the due date.

faqs.question: Can I withdraw from a course?
faqs.answer: Yes, but you must withdraw before the census date to avoid academic and financial penalties.

faqs.question: How do I contact my instructor?
faqs.answer: Use the messaging system in Moodle or email them directly. Check course outline for office hours.
